name: Never Alone (itch)
description:
Imagine you're playing a game table top role playing game and the story is told by a game master and while some music is playing in the background, the hits and sounds effects are all made by the GM describes the effects of each attack. This is the feel of Never Alone.

This is about as serious as most RP games become as the players become to joke around and it becomes a silly fun story with little to more to do than go around being a murder hobo.

Also consider this a demo, as if it gets some traction I will happily make more to the game, but you'll likely get a hour or 2 of fun out of this in it's current state.
